definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="173" y="55"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"></mutation><value name="IF0"><block type="text_binary_ops"><value name="A"><block type="get_command_parameters"><field name="paramid">0</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">autosmelt</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Smelting Touch: Automatically smelts anything that you mine with your pickaxe.</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Smelting Touch enchantment: smelts anything that you mine.</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
